org.daisy.pipeline.tts

Class TTSEngine.SynthesisResult

extends Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      AudioInputStream audio
      The audio produced by the TTS processor.

    • Field Detail

      • audio

        public final AudioInputStream audio
        The audio produced by the TTS processor. The AudioFormat of the stream must be the same every time the same voice is used.

      • marks

        public final List<Integer> marks
        The mark offsets (in bytes) corresponding to the ssml:mark elements of the input SSML. The order must be kept. The offsets are relative to the AudioInputStream. That is, they start at 0. May be null if the TTS processor doesn't handle SSML marks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SynthesisResult

        public SynthesisResult(AudioInputStream audio)

      • SynthesisResult

        public SynthesisResult(AudioInputStream audio,
                       List<Integer> marks)
